content: I cannot speculate on the queen mother's personal opinions about modern initiatives and technology, as i cannot engage in personal opinions or beliefs. however, the queen mother was known for her charitable work, particularly for supporting the arts, educational institutions, and organizations that assisted vulnerable groups. she also regularly attended events and visited charities, hospitals, and other organizations throughout her life. as such, it is very possible that she would have been supportive of modern initiatives and technology if they advanced her charitable causes and benefited society as a whole.
